attr.title: Cybarian
attr.desc: Cybarian The Time Travelling Warrior is a classically inspired arcade action game, with a mixture of modern and retro gaming tropes. Designed to be played through in a single sitting, there are limited checkpoints and no saves.
attr.inst: Download game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/928840/Cybarian_The_Time_Travelling_Warrior/ , rename Cybarian.exe to Cybarian.zip, extract, copy data.win and all .ogg files to /ports/cybarian/gamedata
